document.heading: Real Property Tax Rates for Tax Year 1990 Amendment Act of 1989

history.narrative: Law 8-46, the “Real Property Tax Rates for Tax Year 1990 Amendment Act of 1989,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-319, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 27, 1989 and July 11, 1989, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on August 1, 1989, it was assigned Act No. 8-79 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
